controls.name: Limit system access to authorized users, processes acting on behalf of authorized users, and devices (including other systems)
controls.description: Ensure access control policies are established and procedures are implemented.

criteria.description: Instance has a specific security group

controls.name: Limit system access to the types of transactions and functions that authorized users are permitted to execute
controls.description: Ensure only authorized transactions and functions are allowed.

criteria.description: Instance has IAM roles attached

controls.name: Control the flow of CUI in accordance with approved authorizations.
controls.description: Ensure CUI flow is controlled.

criteria.description: Instance has flow logs enabled

controls.name: Separate the duties of individuals to reduce the risk of malevolent activity without collusion.
controls.description: Ensure duties are separated.

criteria.description: Instance has roles with separate duties

controls.name: Employ the principle of least privilege, including for specific security functions and privileged accounts.
controls.description: Ensure least privilege access is enforced.

criteria.description: Instance uses least privilege for IAM roles

controls.name: Use non-privileged accounts or roles when accessing nonsecurity functions.
controls.description: Ensure non-privileged accounts are used for nonsecurity functions.

criteria.description: Instance uses non-privileged roles for nonsecurity functions

controls.name: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions and capture the execution of such functions in audit logs.
controls.description: Ensure non-privileged users are prevented from executing privileged functions.

criteria.description: Instance prevents non-privileged users from executing privileged functions

controls.name: Limit unsuccessful logon attempts.
controls.description: Ensure unsuccessful logon attempts are limited.

criteria.description: Instance limits unsuccessful logon attempts

controls.name: Provide privacy and security notices consistent with applicable CUI rules.
controls.description: Ensure privacy and security notices are provided.

criteria.description: Instance provides privacy and security notices

controls.name: Use session lock with pattern-hiding displays to prevent access and viewing of data after a period of inactivity.
controls.description: Ensure session lock with pattern-hiding displays is used.

criteria.description: Instance uses session lock with pattern-hiding displays

controls.name: Terminate (automatically) a user session after a defined condition.
controls.description: Ensure user sessions are terminated automatically after a defined condition.

criteria.description: Instance automatically terminates user sessions after a defined condition

controls.name: Monitor and control remote access sessions.
controls.description: Ensure remote access sessions are monitored and controlled.

criteria.description: Instance monitors and controls remote access sessions

controls.name: Employ cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of remote access sessions.
controls.description: Ensure remote access sessions are encrypted.

criteria.description: Instance uses encryption for remote access sessions

controls.name: Route remote access via managed access control points.
controls.description: Ensure remote access is routed via managed access control points.

criteria.description: Instance routes remote access via managed access control points

controls.name: Authorize remote execution of privileged commands and remote access to security-relevant information.
controls.description: Ensure remote execution of privileged commands and access to security-relevant information are authorized.

criteria.description: Instance authorizes remote execution of privileged commands

controls.name: Authorize wireless access prior to allowing such connections.
controls.description: Ensure wireless access is authorized before connections are allowed.

criteria.description: Instance authorizes wireless access before connections

controls.name: Protect wireless access using authentication and encryption.
controls.description: Ensure wireless access is protected using authentication and encryption.

criteria.description: Instance uses authentication and encryption for wireless access

controls.name: Control connection of mobile devices.
controls.description: Ensure connection of mobile devices is controlled.

criteria.description: Instance controls connection of mobile devices

controls.name: Encrypt CUI on mobile devices and mobile computing platforms.
controls.description: Ensure CUI on mobile devices and platforms is encrypted.

criteria.description: Instance encrypts CUI on mobile devices

controls.name: Verify and control/limit connections to and use of external systems.
controls.description: Ensure connections to external systems are verified and controlled.

criteria.description: Instance controls connections to external systems

controls.name: Limit use of organizational portable storage devices on external systems.
controls.description: Ensure use of organizational portable storage devices on external systems is limited.

criteria.description: Instance limits use of portable storage devices on external systems

controls.name: Control CUI posted or processed on publicly accessible systems.
controls.description: Ensure CUI on publicly accessible systems is controlled.

criteria.description: Instance controls CUI on publicly accessible systems

controls.name: Establish and maintain baseline configurations and inventories of organizational information systems (including hardware, software, firmware, and documentation) throughout the respective system development life cycles.
controls.description: Ensure baseline configurations and inventories are maintained.

criteria.description: Instance maintains baseline configurations and inventories

controls.name: Establish and enforce security configuration settings for information technology products employed in organizational information systems.
controls.description: Ensure security configuration settings are enforced.

criteria.description: Instance enforces security configuration settings

controls.name: Track, review, approve/disapprove, and audit changes to information systems.
controls.description: Ensure changes to information systems are tracked, reviewed, and audited.

criteria.description: Instance tracks, reviews, and audits changes

controls.name: Analyze the security impact of changes prior to implementation.
controls.description: Ensure security impact of changes is analyzed prior to implementation.

criteria.description: Instance analyzes security impact of changes

controls.name: Define, document, approve, and enforce physical and logical access restrictions associated with changes to information systems.
controls.description: Ensure access restrictions associated with changes are enforced.

criteria.description: Instance enforces access restrictions for changes

controls.name: Employ the principle of least functionality by configuring the information system to provide only essential capabilities.
controls.description: Ensure information system provides only essential capabilities.

criteria.description: Instance is configured to provide only essential capabilities

controls.name: Restrict, disable, or prevent the use of nonessential programs, functions, ports, protocols, and services.
controls.description: Ensure nonessential programs, functions, ports, protocols, and services are restricted, disabled, or prevented.

criteria.description: Instance restricts, disables, or prevents nonessential programs and services

controls.name: Apply deny-by-exception (blacklist) policy to prevent the use of unauthorized software or deny-all, permit-by-exception (whitelist) policy to allow the execution of authorized software.
controls.description: Ensure deny-by-exception or permit-by-exception policies are applied.

criteria.description: Instance applies deny-by-exception or permit-by-exception policies

controls.name: Control and monitor user-installed software.
controls.description: Ensure user-installed software is controlled and monitored.

criteria.description: Instance controls and monitors user-installed software

controls.name: Create and retain system audit logs and records to the extent needed to enable the monitoring, analysis, investigation, and reporting of unlawful or unauthorized system activity.
controls.description: Ensure system audit logs and records are created and retained.

criteria.description: Instance creates and retains system audit logs

controls.name: Ensure that the actions of individual system users can be uniquely traced to those users so they can be held accountable for their actions.
controls.description: Ensure actions of system users can be traced.

criteria.description: Instance traces actions of individual system users

controls.name: Review and update logged events.
controls.description: Ensure logged events are reviewed and updated.

criteria.description: Instance reviews and updates logged events

controls.name: Alert in the event of an audit logging process failure.
controls.description: Ensure alerts are generated in the event of an audit logging process failure.

criteria.description: Instance alerts in the event of audit logging process failure

controls.name: Correlate audit record review, analysis, and reporting processes for investigation and response to indications of unlawful, unauthorized, suspicious, or unusual activity.
controls.description: Ensure audit records are correlated for investigation and response.

criteria.description: Instance correlates audit records for investigation

controls.name: Provide audit reduction and report generation to support on-demand analysis and reporting.
controls.description: Ensure audit reduction and report generation is provided.

criteria.description: Instance provides audit reduction and report generation

controls.name: Provide a system capability that compares and synchronizes internal system clocks with an authoritative source to generate time stamps for audit records.
controls.description: Ensure system clocks are synchronized with an authoritative source.

criteria.description: Instance synchronizes system clocks with an authoritative source
